title: Azir Bug while aa whit his soldier 5.20
body: Sometimes when I auto attack with my soldier there is a bug. Azir is doing the animation of auto attacking(when he gives an order) but the soldier doesn`t respond. The soldier are always in range of an auto attack and ready but do not respond. It might be only on my side but since the patch doesn`t say anything about that i guess nobody as noticed it.

replies.body: Can confirm, this has happened to me way too many times.
Do you have a reproduction steps of this? How do you make this happen all the time?

While you're at it please address this as well
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/wbgl9GuB-azir-bug-all-skills-usable-with-no-soldiers-present-game-crash

I believe it happens when you are at the max (or close to max) range for soldier autos. If possible, load up a custom game and try it out on some minions.

*It also kinda self-roots him during the animation for about 0.3-0.5 seconds.
I doesnt only happen at max range, well not for me at least. I`ll try and see.
I`ll try to reproduce it and will give you a notice back.
